titles.title: Keep up the song of faith

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Keep up the song of faith, And let your heart be strong, For God delights when faith can praise Though dark the night and long.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Keep up the song of faith, The dawn will break ere long, And we shall go to meet the Lord, And join the endless song.{/lang-eng}
